sourcesContent:
// src/components/AddLeadForm.js
import React from "react";
import { Modal, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; // ✅ this is the important import!

const AddLeadForm = ({ show, handleClose }) => {
  return (
    <Modal show={show} onHide={handleClose} centered>
      <Modal.Header closeButton>
        <Modal.Title>Add New Lead</Modal.Title>
      </Modal.Header>

      <Modal.Body>
        <Form>
          <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formName">
            <Form.Label>Full Name *</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="Enter full name" required />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formContact">
            <Form.Label>Contact Number *</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="Enter contact number" required />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formTrip">
            <Form.Label>Trip Name / Destination *</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="e.g. Bali Paradise Tour" required />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formDates">
            <Form.Label>Travel Dates *</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="e.g. 15–20 Jan 2025" required />
          </Form.Group>

          <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formNotes">
            <Form.Label>Notes</Form.Label>
            <Form.Control as="textarea" rows={2} placeholder="Any additional info..." />
          </Form.Group>
        </Form>
      </Modal.Body>

      <Modal.Footer>
        <Button variant="secondary" onClick={handleClose}>
          Cancel
        </Button>
        <Button variant="warning">Add Lead</Button>
      </Modal.Footer>
    </Modal>
  );
};

export default AddLeadForm;
